content.body: i notice that https://tc39.es/ecma262/#sec-bigintbitwiseop takes two bigints, but passes them into modulo, which is a math function. is this something that caio's PR should be handling? (i haven't looked at it yet)
bakkot_: how do we write grammar that has both flags *and* an _opt?
ooh i see an example of this in 262, let's see how that's done
nevermind, that works fine, there was a stray space
